channel.title: weekly-review on Nduati Daniel
channel.description: Recent content in weekly-review on Nduati Daniel

item.title: Weekly Notes 3
item.description: Week’s Quote Confusion is a feeling that precedes learning something. It means you should pay closer attention, not disengage. — Unknown Personal My small sister turned a year older! Started interviewing with another Kenyan hardware startup. Had my first live coding interview session! The challenges were really interesting and fun to solve! Been trying to use twitter less and reducing my general social media consumption. Barcelona has really been playing good football lately.

item.title: Weekly Notes 2
item.description: Week’s Quote Each day gives us a sunrise and a sunset. Often, that is enough. — Unknown Personal Been learning some Rust and Go on and off. Binged an unhealthy amount of “Mordern Family”. Not a very productive week for me overall. Random interesting stuff The ThePrimeagen’s video: Is ADHD Bad For Programming? Learning Go as a Python Developer: The Good and the Bad Theo’s developer goals video.

item.title: Weekly Notes 1
item.description: Week’s Quote What I cannot create, I do not understand. — Richard Feynman Open Source Work Made my first open source contribution to hugo-coder the theme that this website is built on. The PR though just a doc link fix, got reviewed and merged. Personal I’ve commited to writting a weekly-review of stuff I do or happens to me over each week, and which I find interesting enough to write about.
